column5: ... and then he wanted to go play at the park.   Future Simcoe hawg?  For the first one I just took the picture, this one I told him to say cheese... I'll stick to candid shots from now on.
Great stuff Rob! Enjoy to the fullest!!
Lipped that Hawg like a real Pro !!! Priceless KF.You must be real proud
Looks like he's on the third syllable of 'gorgonzola'.    Lovely pics, and it's great to see a kid having fun with his dad!
with luck, me and my kids will be doing the same later today and maybe tomorrow.  nice pic's!
Good looking lad ya got there Rob, lippin the hawg like a pro!
you know i like that pic Rob!  great shot...keep up the good work!
Im going to eat you,oh yes I am.LOL  Great little report Rob.
